words.source: H1992 (הֵם, 'they'), personal pronoun 3mp; KJV 'these are they which', ESV 'these are the ones who', NASB 'it was they who'
H1696 article + Piel participle masculine plural of דָּבַר 'to speak'; KJV 'spake', ESV 'spoke', NASB 'spoke'
H6547 (פַּרְעֹה, 'Pharaoh'), proper noun; KJV/ESV/NASB all render 'Pharaoh'
H4428 noun common masculine singular construct of מֶלֶךְ 'king'; KJV/ESV/NASB all render 'king of'
H4714 (מִצְרַיִם, 'Egypt'), proper noun; KJV/ESV/NASB all render 'Egypt'
H3318 prep. l- + Hiphil infinitive construct of יָצָא 'to go out'; KJV 'to bring out', ESV 'to bring out', NASB 'to bring out'
H853 (אֵת), particle direct object marker; untranslated in English
H1121 noun common masculine plural construct of בֵּן 'son'; KJV 'the children of', ESV 'the people of', NASB 'the sons of'
H3478 (יִשְׂרָאֵל, 'Israel'), proper noun; KJV/ESV/NASB all render 'Israel'
H4714 prep. min + proper noun (מִצְרַיִם, 'Egypt'); KJV 'out of Egypt', ESV 'from Egypt', NASB 'from Egypt'
H1931 (הוּא, 'he/it'), personal pronoun 3ms; KJV 'these are that', ESV 'this', NASB 'it was'
H4872 (מֹשֶׁה, 'Moses'), proper noun masculine; KJV/ESV/NASB all render 'Moses'
H175 conj. waw + proper noun masculine (אַהֲרֹן, 'Aaron'); KJV/ESV/NASB all render 'and Aaron'
